page.title: 16TRANSPORT-PLAYING PLACE/KEA
page.content: The most popular kind of transport is the{car.}Many people have two or even three cars because there are few bus services.People travel on{buses to their work in TRURO.Another kind of transport is the{train}which is mostly used for long distance travel. the nearest station is in Truro. Most children have{bicycles}which they ride for fun.Only a few older children ride their bicycles to school on the main road.At sixteen some young people choose to get a{motorcycle. Keeping a{horse}or{pony}is expensive but some people keep them to ride on the road and on bridle paths, for pleasure. We of also see{tractors which are used for farm transport and {caravans}being towed by cars. The{roads}through our area are very busy, especially in the Summer, when they carry holiday traffic.
